comment: I absolutely loved Professor Mango's course and their teaching style. They were so understanding and patient that I was never afraid to ask them questions. They also helped us understand ToonBoom tools and animation skills we may have forgotten. I really appreciated how helpful they were. Definitely one of the best professors I've had here.
They are such a nice and very fair professor! They give really good feedback on projects and I highly recommend taking their classes if you can :)

They are hilarious, very chill, and they really love to see students succeed. Easy to ask questions, and even if they don't know the answer, they will help you figure it out or troubleshoot. I would always laugh in this class. Great balance of working and learning while still having fun.
